busdesc: Microsemi Storage Solutions, Inc. designs, develops, markets, and supports semiconductor solutions for communications network infrastructure equipment worldwide. Its semiconductor devices enable networking equipment primarily in three markets, including storage, optical, and mobile networks.
Netflix, Inc. provides subscription streaming entertainment service. It offers TV series, documentaries, and feature films across various genres and languages.
CA, Inc., doing business as CA technologies, develops, markets, delivers, and licenses software products and services in the United States and internationally.
Charter Communications, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides cable services to residential and commercial customers in the United States.

Equinix (Nasdaq: EQIX) is the world's digital infrastructure company, enabling digital leaders to harness a trusted platform to bring together and interconnect the foundational infrastructure that powers their success.
Nektar Therapeutics, a biopharmaceutical company, researches and develops drug candidates for cancer and auto-immune disease in the United States.

Level 3 Parent, LLC provides various integrated communications services for enterprise, government, wholesale, and small and medium business customers in North America, Latin America, Europe, the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, and Africa.
Akamai Technologies, Inc. provides cloud services for delivering, optimizing, and securing content and business applications over the Internet in the United States and internationally.
